languages.text: "Последуем совету Ирлиэт. Пустите среди вандалов слух о какой-то великой ценности. Когда они передерутся, устройте облаву и разбейте их".
"We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."
languages.original_text: "Последуем совету Ирлиэт. Пустите среди вандалов слух о какой-то великой ценности. Когда они передерутся, устройте облаву и разбейте их".

traits.locale_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. We shall spread a rumour about something valuable among the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall raid and finish them.
"We shall follow Yrliet's advice. We shall spread a rumour about something valuable among the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall raid and finish them.

"We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

"We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.
"We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

languages.text: “我们应该听从伊莉耶特的建议，散布谣言说某些叛乱分子手中拿着某种贵重物品。等他们自相残杀完之后，你再出其不意，将他们一举剿灭。”
languages.original_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

traits.locale_text: “我们应该听从伊莉耶特的建议，散布谣言说某些叛乱分子手中拿着某种贵重物品。等他们自相残杀完之后，你再出其不意，将他们一举剿灭。”

languages.text: «Seguiremos el consejo de Yrliet. Hagamos correr rumores sobre ciertos objetos de valor en posesión de los vándalos. Y cuando acaben de pelearse entre ellos, llevaréis a cabo una incursión y acabaréis con ellos».
languages.original_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

traits.locale_text: «Seguiremos el consejo de Yrliet. Hagamos correr rumores sobre ciertos objetos de valor en posesión de los vándalos. Y cuando acaben de pelearse entre ellos, llevaréis a cabo una incursión y acabaréis con ellos».

languages.text: 「ユリエットの助言に従おう。破壊者が所有する特定の貴重品についての噂を流そうじゃないか。そして、奴らの内部での争いが終わったら、奴らに急襲をかけ、とどめを刺すのだ」
languages.original_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットの助言に従おう。破壊者が所有する特定の貴重品についての噂を流そうじゃないか。そして、奴らの内部での争いが終わったら、奴らに急襲をかけ、とどめを刺すのだ」

languages.text: « Nous suivrons le conseil d'Yrliet. Faisons courir la rumeur que les Vandales sont en possession de certains objets précieux et, quand ils auront fini de s'entretuer, vous lancerez une attaque pour les achever. »
languages.original_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

traits.locale_text: « Nous suivrons le conseil d'Yrliet. Faisons courir la rumeur que les Vandales sont en possession de certains objets précieux et, quand ils auront fini de s'entretuer, vous lancerez une attaque pour les achever. »

languages.text: "Wir befolgen Yrliets Rat. Verbreiten wir Gerüchte über bestimmte Wertgegenstände, die sich im Besitz der Vandalen befinden. Und wenn sie sich genügend untereinander bekriegt haben, dann führt Ihr eine Razzia durch und gebt ihnen den Rest.
languages.original_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

traits.locale_text: "Wir befolgen Yrliets Rat. Verbreiten wir Gerüchte über bestimmte Wertgegenstände, die sich im Besitz der Vandalen befinden. Und wenn sie sich genügend untereinander bekriegt haben, dann führt Ihr eine Razzia durch und gebt ihnen den Rest.
